page.title: 20Acknowledgements.
page.content: The work that has been undertaken on this square has involved a number of schools in two different education authorities-London Boroughs of Merton and Sutton. The age ranges of the pupils involved was from five to sixteen and covered all abilities. The schools involved were; Cheam Park Farm Primary School, Tweeddale Primary School, St.Catherine's Middle School and Gaynesford, Greenshaw, Willows and Garth High Schools. The work was undertaken in June and July 1985 in preparation for Domesday 1986. The information from all the schools was put onto the computer at Garth High School.
